languages.text: "Инцидент положил начало нам. Корабль стал лучше благодаря нам тоже. Все это — звенья одной цепи, но мы пока не можем ее сковать..."
"The Incident marked the beginning of us. The ship became better because of us too. These are all links in the same chain, but we cannot piece them together yet..."
languages.original_text: "Инцидент положил начало нам. Корабль стал лучше благодаря нам тоже. Все это — звенья одной цепи, но мы пока не можем ее сковать..."

traits.locale_text: "The Incident marked the beginning of us. The ship became better because of us too. These are all links in the same chain, but we cannot piece them together yet..."
traits.speaker: PeacefulServitor_Nomos

traits.locale_text: "The Incident marked the beginning of us. The ship became better because of us too. These are all links in the same chain, but we cannot piece them together yet..."
traits.speaker: PeacefulServitor_Nomos

traits.locale_text: "The Incident marked the beginning of us. The ship became better because of us too. These are all links in the same chain, but we cannot piece them together yet..."

traits.locale_text: "The Incident marked the beginning of us. The ship became better because of us too. These are all links in the same chain, but we cannot piece them together yet..."
traits.speaker: PeacefulServitor_Nomos

languages.text: «El incidente marcó nuestro comienzo. La nave se volvió mejor gracias a nosotros. Todo esto son eslabones de una misma cadena, pero todavía no podemos conectarlos...».
languages.original_text: "The Incident marked the beginning of us. The ship became better because of us too. These are all links in the same chain, but we cannot piece them together yet..."

traits.locale_text: «El incidente marcó nuestro comienzo. La nave se volvió mejor gracias a nosotros. Todo esto son eslabones de una misma cadena, pero todavía no podemos conectarlos...».
traits.speaker: PeacefulServitor_Nomos

languages.text: 「この事件が我々の始まりとなった。船は我々のおかげで改善した。すべての同じ鎖の中の輪として成りたっているが、またそれぞれを繋ぎ合わせることはできない…」
languages.original_text: "The Incident marked the beginning of us. The ship became better because of us too. These are all links in the same chain, but we cannot piece them together yet..."

traits.locale_text: 「この事件が我々の始まりとなった。船は我々のおかげで改善した。すべての同じ鎖の中の輪として成りたっているが、またそれぞれを繋ぎ合わせることはできない…」
traits.speaker: PeacefulServitor_Nomos

languages.text: “那场事故标志着我们的起源，而有了我的存在，这艘船也确实变得更好了。这一切都是同一条链条上的环节，但我们还没办法拼凑出真相……”
languages.original_text: "The Incident marked the beginning of us. The ship became better because of us too. These are all links in the same chain, but we cannot piece them together yet..."

traits.locale_text: “那场事故标志着我们的起源，而有了我的存在，这艘船也确实变得更好了。这一切都是同一条链条上的环节，但我们还没办法拼凑出真相……”
traits.speaker: PeacefulServitor_Nomos

languages.text: « L'incident a marqué notre commencement. Le vaisseau s'est amélioré grâce à nous. Tous ces éléments forment les anneaux d'une même chaîne, mais nous ne parvenons pas encore à les assembler... »
languages.original_text: "The Incident marked the beginning of us. The ship became better because of us too. These are all links in the same chain, but we cannot piece them together yet..."

traits.locale_text: « L'incident a marqué notre commencement. Le vaisseau s'est amélioré grâce à nous. Tous ces éléments forment les anneaux d'une même chaîne, mais nous ne parvenons pas encore à les assembler... »
traits.speaker: PeacefulServitor_Nomos

languages.text: "Der Vorfall markierte unseren Anfang. Auch das Schiff ist durch uns besser geworden. Das sind alles Glieder derselben Kette, doch wir können sie noch nicht zusammensetzen ..."
languages.original_text: "The Incident marked the beginning of us. The ship became better because of us too. These are all links in the same chain, but we cannot piece them together yet..."

traits.locale_text: "Der Vorfall markierte unseren Anfang. Auch das Schiff ist durch uns besser geworden. Das sind alles Glieder derselben Kette, doch wir können sie noch nicht zusammensetzen ..."
traits.speaker: PeacefulServitor_Nomos

languages.text: "Hadise, Nomos'un başlangıcı oldu. Geminin gelişmesi de bizim sayemizde oldu. Tüm bunlar aynı zincirin halkaları fakat henüz tümünü bir araya getiremiyoruz..."
languages.original_text: "The Incident marked the beginning of us. The ship became better because of us too. These are all links in the same chain, but we cannot piece them together yet..."

traits.locale_text: "Hadise, bizim meydana gelişimizin nişanesi. Geminin gelişmesi de bizim sayemizde oldu. Tüm bunlar aynı zincirin halkaları fakat henüz tümünü bir araya getiremiyoruz..."
traits.speaker: PeacefulServitor_Nomos
